letters

Class RegisteredLetter<C extends Letter<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • letters.Letter<Content>
      • letters.DecoratingLetter<C>
        • letters.RegisteredLetter<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - The content's type of the registered letter

    public class RegisteredLetter<C extends Letter<?>>
extends DecoratingLetter<C>
    Class with defines a RegisteredLetter which once it's received trigger the sending of a receipt of acknowledgment
    Author:
    Thomas OSTROWSKI
